item.description:
Before you start chowing on that Turkey leg and gobbling up stuffing, squash and cranberry sauce, you are going to need to work off a few calories to make room. And what better way to do so than to come to Improv Boston's Studio 40 to have Rebels Without Applauze, First ImpAct and Hamaconda make you laugh. Laughing burns off calories. Laughing through the whole show is the equivalent of running a marathon but without the foot blisters. So come on out to the show and work out with us.

Tickets are $12 adults and $10 for students. You can buy tickets online with no fees at http://www.improvboston.com/shows/studio40
item.name: Pre-Thanksgiving Improv Comedy at Improv Boston
